8) Physical Science – Multiple Choice Models are frequently employed in science. Which of the following is not true of scientific models? W) They cannot be changed once formalized X) They are patterned after items or events in the natural world Y) They facilitate communication Z) They offer a means of testing predictions
answer: W) THEY CANNOT BE CHANGED ONCE FORMALIZED

answer:
W) DISRUPTION OF KERATIN HYDROGEN BONDS
